name: ticketless
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
without a ticket: Ticketless fans were told to stay away from the match. Over 17,000 people were fined for travelling ticketless in March.
without using a printed ticket: Travel is ticketless and bookings are confirmed by email. By the end of the year, 30 percent of passengers will be flying ticketless.
